div.p:
As distributed via SchoolMessenger: Mar 24, 2020, 12:30 PM
Dear Students/Parents/Staff and Community Members,
We want you to know that while we hope for a resumption of the normal in-person school year, it has been communicated to us by the Commissioner of Education, State Government and local public health officials that we should plan for continued online learning for the remainder of the school year. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Closed Indefinitely - Closure information
